passive.name: The Plum Fragrance In My Bones
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). Should the wearer's Break Effect exceed or equal <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>, 1 Skill Point will be recovered.\nAt the start of each wave, all allies regenerate <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[f1]</unbreak></color> Energy immediately. Effects of the same type cannot stack.
